title: Netezza Performance Server
introduction: Welcome to the Netezza Performance Server for Cloud Pak for Data as a Service product documentation.

section_highlights.title: FAQ

tiles.title: Netezza introduces enhanced cloud integration, security, and table management features—including REST catalog support for Iceberg, Azure Gen2 compatibility, customer-managed encryption keys, and AWS Marketplace availability—alongside new notification capabilities for NPSaaS users.

Introduced Iceberg enhancements for improved table operations and data management, along with new Database Assistant skills for deeper insights into user activity, query performance, data distribution, and access control.
Database Assistant is now generally available on AWS and Azure, and the Netezza JDBC driver has been updated with enhanced security through JRE 15.0.2 and Kerberos support.
Introduced connection history to easily track all your successful and failed connections with detailed reasons for any failures.
Added support for scaling (compute/storage) in the paused state.
Introduced the Netezza Database Assistant chatbot for AWS, a new AI-powered assistant.
